name: Mexican Michelada Sinaloa Style
description: Is a Mexican cocktail with beer and seafood, prepared with lemon, shrimp, tomato juice, clam, inglesa sauce, and celery add a delicious flavor to the drink.

ingredients.ingredient: celery, cut into strips and without skin

directions: With the help of a wet napkin and a flat plate covered with chili pepper, frost the ball glass.
Add all the ingredients (except the beer and the celery).
Mix the drink slightly with a spoon.
